PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00602011-02-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Consumer Chemicals and Containers Regulations, 2001
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONSUMER CHEMICALS AND CONTAINERS REGULATIONS, 2001, in order to maintain the same prohibitions of chemical products and containers when moving from the Hazardous Products Act to the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act, which comes into force on June 20, 2011. To maintain the prohibitions, section 2 will be replaced, section 38 will be re-introduced, and sections 45 and 53 will be replaced.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0024 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
